about_the_game:
The game has been reworked to make it closer to the game's name. The main body of the game is currently being planned, the previous exploration game has been used as a gameplay option in the home simulator with a minigame named Simple Investigation, and now a new minigame named Simple Survival has been added (uploaded game framework, is still being updated). The overall structure of the game in the future is: a main simulation game (home simulation), plus some small games (play options).

Simple investigation is a relatively casual and relatively free exploration game, the player will be a house sleep tester (in fact, a special plainclothes police), the police have a task, the player needs to explore a villa in a limited time to investigate, looking for evidence of the villa owner's crime. The whole game is relatively easy, almost no danger, each exploration players have 8 hours (in-game time, real time 2 hours) time, free to explore in the villa, the entire game most of the items are interactive.

In addition to the teaching level in the game has guidance, there is almost no guidance in the villa, the secret in the villa, the player needs to explore, and the player thinks that is evidence or valuable items to mark, the whole game has the following kinds of markable items, non-evidence, general evidence, important evidence, key evidence, cash and valuable items, in addition to non-evidence is deducted. All others are bonus points, and these markers will be settled at the end of the game, and different scores may obtain different endings.

Simple Survival (currently only frame) is a low polyhedral style survival game, you can explore, survive and so on throughout the map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64x
  • Processor: Core i5 64-bit quad-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64x
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or higher level processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 or higher graphics card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
